Package Controller

Class MainWindowController

java.lang.Object
Controller.MainWindowController
All Implemented Interfaces:
javafx.fxml.Initializable
public class MainWindowController extends Object implements javafx.fxml.Initializable
This class controls the main window. It displays all appointments, allows deletion of said appointments and access to the customer view windows, the report windows, the add appointment, and modify appointment windows.

  • Method Details

    • setTable

      public void setTable(javafx.collections.ObservableList<Appointment> appointments)
      Attaches the supplied observable list to a tableview.
      Parameters:
      appointments - Observable list of appointments to set the table with.

    • onClickDeleteAppointment

      public void onClickDeleteAppointment(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
      Deletes the selected appointment from the database then refills the list of appointments and applies it to the appointment table. It also resets the filter to no filter and displays the new complete list of appointments.
      Parameters:
      event - the mouseclick that activates the button.

    • onClickAddAppointment

      public void onClickAddAppointment(javafx.event.ActionEvent event) throws IOException
      Changes the window to the add appointment window.
      Parameters:
      event - mouseclick that activates the button.
      Throws:
      IOException - if the add appointment fxml files isn't found.

    • onClickEditAppointment

      public void onClickEditAppointment(javafx.event.ActionEvent event) throws IOException
      Captures the selected appointment, sends it to the modify appointment window, then changes the window to the modify appointment window.
      Parameters:
      event - the mouseclick that activates the button.
      Throws:
      IOException - if the modify appointment window fxml file isn't found.

    • onSelectFilterByWeek

      public void onSelectFilterByWeek(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
      creates a list of appointments in the next week then sets a label to display this time range, hiding the default label. It then applies the new list to the appointment TableView.
      Parameters:
      event - activating the radio button.

    • onSelectNoFilter

      public void onSelectNoFilter(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
      Sets the appointment TableView to show all appointments. Hides the week range label and displays the default label.
      Parameters:
      event - activating the radio button.

    • onSelectFilterByMonth

      public void onSelectFilterByMonth(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
      Creates a list of appointments that take place in the current month and sets the appointment TableView to display them. Hides the week range label and displays the default label.
      Parameters:
      event - activating the radio button.

    • initialize

      public void initialize(URL url, ResourceBundle resourceBundle)
      First method called when the window is created. Selects the no filter radio button. Then initializes the appointment TableView.
      Specified by:
      initialize in interface javafx.fxml.Initializable
      Parameters:
      url - The location used to resolve relative paths for the root object, or null if the location is not known.
      resourceBundle - The resources used to localize the root object, or null if the root object was not localized.
